cs.FL, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.DM, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with the study of automata and words, which suggests that it could belong to the Formal Languages and Automata Theory (cs.FL) category. The paper also involves the use of morphisms and adicity, which are concepts related to discrete mathematics (cs.DM) and information theory (cs.IT). The paper also discusses the recognition of directive words, which could be related to the study of automata and data structures (cs.DS). Finally, the paper provides a characterization of infinite LSP words, which could be related to the study of string algorithms and information retrieval (cs.SI).
